TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit ModuleHandle extends System.ValueType

summary.span: Represents a runtime handle for a module.

span.span: Represents a runtime handle for a module.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ， ，和方法提供有效率解析的中繼資料語彙基元，以執行階段控制代碼欄位、 方法和目前的模組中的類型。The , , and methods provide efficient resolution of metadata tokens to runtime handles for fields, methods, and types in the current module.

summary.span: Gets the metadata stream version.

span.span: Gets the metadata stream version.

value.span: 32 位元整數，表示中繼資料資料流版本。

span.span: A 32-bit integer representing the metadata stream version.

value.span: 高序位兩個位元組表示的主要版本號碼，而低序位兩個位元組表示的次要版本號碼。

span.span: The high-order two bytes represent the major version number, and the low-order two bytes represent the minor version number.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 如需有關中繼資料標頭的詳細資訊，請參閱第二部分： 中繼資料定義和語意文件集。For more information on the metadata header, see the Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics documentation. 您可以線上取得這份文件；請參閱 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和通用語言基礎結構標準](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)，以及 Ecma International 網站上的[標準 ECMA-335 - 通用語言基礎結構 (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要解決其父代的識別欄位的中繼資料語彙基元`TypeSpec`有包含項目類型的簽章`var`或`mvar`，使用方法多載，可讓您提供必要的內容。To resolve a metadata token that identifies a field whose parent `TypeSpec` has a signature containing element type `var` or `mvar`, use the method overload, which allows you to supply the necessary context. > [!NOTE] > 可以找到中繼資料語彙基元的相關資訊，通用語言基礎結構 (CLI) 文件，尤其是 < 磁碟分割 II： 中繼資料定義和語意 > 中。Information about metadata tokens can be found in the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics". 您可以線上取得這份文件；請參閱 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和通用語言基礎結構標準](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)，以及 Ecma International 網站上的[標準 ECMA-335 - 通用語言基礎結構 (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site.

exception.span: is not a valid token in the scope of the current module.

span.span: is not a valid token in the scope of the current module.

exception.span: -or- is not a token for a field in the scope of the current module.

span.span: -or- is not a token for a field in the scope of the current module.

exception.span: -or- identifies a field whose parent has a signature containing element type or .

span.span: -or- identifies a field whose parent has a signature containing element type or .

exception.span: The method is called on an empty field handle.

span.span: The method is called on an empty field handle.
